snippet.title: Flat Eye - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description: Flat Eye will be released on Steam on November 14, 2022. Watch the latest trailer to learn more about this management game where you are in charge of a futuristic gas station in Iceland. In Flat Eye, you will be able to install new exciting modules that will attract customers to your station, drawing from their experiences to explore humanity through the advancement of technology. A demo for the game is available now.
